data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.Title
data.value: You will need to take action under the EPR

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentBanner
data.value: You will need to report packaging data

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentPrint1
data.value: You can

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentPrint2
data.value: print or save this page as a PDF

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentHeading1
data.value: What this means for your organisation

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentNationDataHeading
data.value: Submit nation data <IF NATION DATA IS APPLICABLE>

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentNationDataParagraph1
data.value: You will need to submit nation data.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentNationDataParagraph2
data.value: Nation data is information about which nation in the UK packaging is supplied in and which nation in the UK packaging is discarded in.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentNationDataParagraph3
data.value: Nation data should show where in the UK you’ve supplied packaging to a person or business who’s gone on to discard it.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.SupplyingPackagingContent
data.value:
Supplying packaging includes:

  • selling
  • hiring
  • loaning
  • gifting

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentNationDataInset1
data.value: You'll need to submit your nation data for the 2024 calendar year by 1 December 2025.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentHeading4
data.value: What you should do next

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentHeading5
data.value: What you told us

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.OrganisationTypeAlternateRowTitle
data.value: Organisation type

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.AnnualTurnoverAlternateRowTitle
data.value: Turnover

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.OwnBrand.AlternateRowTitle
data.value: Supply goods to the UK market under your own brand

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.UnbrandedPackaging.AlternateRowTitle
data.value: Place goods into packaging that's unbranded when sold

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ImportingProducts.AlternateRowTitle
data.value: Do you import packaged goods to supply to the UK market?

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.SellingEmptyPackaging.AlternateRowTitle
data.value: Selling empty packaging to other businesses

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.HiringLoaning.AlternateRowTitle
data.value: Do you hire or loan out reusable packaging to UK organisations?

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.OnlineMarketplace.AlternateRowTitle
data.value: Do you own an online maketplace allowing non-UK companies to sell packaged goods in the UK?

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.SupplyingFilledPackaging.AlternateRowTitle
data.value: Supplying filled packaging to consumers

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.AmountYouSupplyAlternateRowTitle
data.value: Packaging amount

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.PlaceDrinksOnMarketAlternateRowTitle
data.value: Place drinks containers on the market

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.MaterialsForDrinksContainersAlternateRowTitle
data.value: Materials used for drinks containers

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContainerVolumeAlternateRowTitle
data.value: Drinks containers between 50ml and 3l

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph1Small
data.value: Under EPR for packaging, you're classed as a small organisation. This means you will need to record and submit data about the packaging you import and supply.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph1SmallParent
data.value: Under EPR for packaging, you're classed as a small organisation. This means you will need to record and submit data about the packaging you import and supply.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph2SmallParent
data.value: As a parent company, you must submit data separately for each of the subsidiaries within your group registration. You do not need to include data for any of your subsidiaries that have registered independently.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph1SmallSubsidiary
data.value: Under EPR for packaging, you're classed as a small organisation. This means you will need to record and submit data about the packaging you import and supply.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph2SmallSubsidiary
data.value: As a subsidiary, your parent company may need to report data on your behalf if it’s classed as a large organisation. Sign in to your EPR account or create an account

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph1Large
data.value: Under EPR for packaging, you're classed as a large organisation. This means you will need to record and submit data about the packaging you import and supply.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph2Small
data.value:
You must:

  • record data about empty packaging and packaged goods you import and supply in the UK market from 1 January 2024
  • create an account and register your organisation by 1 April 2025
  • pay a fee to the environmental regulator - contact your UK nation's regulator for more information about fees
  • submit data about empty packaging and packaged goods you imported or supplied through the UK market throughout 2024

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph2Large
data.value:
You must:

  • record data about empty packaging and packaged goods you import and supply in the UK market from 1 January 2024
  • create an account and register your organisation by 1 April 2025
  • pay a fee to the environmental regulator - contact your UK country’s regulator for more information about fees
  • submit data about empty packaging and packaged goods you imported or supplied through the UK market every six months

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph1LargeSubsidiary
data.value: Under EPR for packaging, you're classed as a large organisation. This means you’ll need to record and submit data about the packaging you import and supply.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph2LargeSubsidiary
data.value: As a subsidiary, your parent company may need to report data on your behalf if it's also classed as a large organisation. Sign in to your EPR account or create an account.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph1LargeParent
data.value: Under EPR for packaging, you're classed as a large organisation. This means you will need to record and submit data about the packaging you import and supply.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph2LargeParent
data.value: As a parent company, you must submit data separately for each of the subsidiaries within your group registration. You do not need to include data for any of your subsidiaries that have registered independently.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.WhenToCollectAndReportHeader
data.value: When to collect and report

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.WhenToCollectAndReportContent
data.value:
If you have all the required data recorded from 1 January 2023, you should report this data.

If you do not have all the required data recorded from 1 January, you must report all of your data from 1 March 2023. If you report data that covers a period starting from 1 March, this will be used to calculate a full year’s worth of data.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentInset1Small
data.value: You’ll need to submit your data by 1 April 2024.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentInset1Large
data.value: For the period January to June 2023, report data by 1 October 2023.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentInset2Large
data.value: For the period July to December 2023, report data by 1 April 2024.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph3Large
data.value: For any packaging that you supply or import that is collected by local authorities from households or public bins, from April 2024 you must pay:

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentHeading2Large
data.value: Meet your recycling obligations

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentUoList1A
data.value: a waste management fee

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentUoList1B
data.value: scheme administrator costs

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph4Large
data.value: You must get packaging waste recycling notes (PRNs) or packaging waste export recycling notes (PERNs) in 2024.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph5Large
data.value: We’ll let you know how many PRNs and PERNs you need to get. We’ll base this on your 2023 data.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentDetailsPrnPerns
data.value:
What are PRNs and PERNs?

A PRN or PERN is evidence that packaging waste has been recycled.

You can get PRNs from accredited reprocessors. Reprocessors are responsible for recycling packaging waste. You can also get PERNs from accredited exporters.

By getting PRNs and PERNs, you work towards meeting your recycling obligations.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.ContentParagraph2Seller
data.value:
You must:

  • record data about empty packaging and packaged goods you import and supply in the UK market from 1 January 2024
  • create an account and register your organisation by 1 April 2025
  • pay a fee to the environmental regulator - contact your UK country’s regulator for more information about fees
  • submit data about empty packaging and packaged goods you importd or supplied through the UK market

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.WhatYouShouldDoNextParagraph
data.value: Collect data about the packaging you supplied through the UK market or imported into the UK.

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.WhatYouShouldDoNextLinkDescription
data.value: Find out more about the data you'll need to collect (opens in a new tab)

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.TypeOfProducerSmall
data.value: Small

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.TypeOfProducerLarge
data.value: Large

data.name: WhatYouNeedToDo.TypeOfProducerText
data.value: Organisation size
